### Government Tender for MatLab and Technical Specifications

#### Tender Information

| **Category** | **Description** |
| --- | --- |
| **Title** | MatLab (or equivalent) for SSC (BPM020010) |
| **Reference Number** | SSC-23-00024427:T |
| **Amendment Number** | 2 |
| **Solicitation Number** | BPM020010/24427 |
| **Publication Date** | 09 Nov 2023 |
| **Tender Closing Date** | 19 Nov 2023 (14:00:00) |
| **Amendment Date** | 16 Nov 2023 |

#### Tender Details

*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: None
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: None
*   **Tender Status**: Expired

#### Technical Specifications

MatLab and equivalent software requirements will be available in the solicitation documentation.

#### Contracting Entity Information

*   **Contracting Entity**: Shared Services Canada
*   **Address**: 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K0A 0C3, Canada

#### Contact Information

*   **Contact Name**: Clara Whittaker
*   **Email**: None
*   **Phone**: 343-553-8354
*   **Fax**: 343-553-8354
*   **Address**: 180 Kent, Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 0B6, Canada

#### Bidder Registration

To register, please go to https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login and click on the Register Now button. Note that a technical issue led to a re-launch of this solicitation.
